law.catch_line: Unlawful to refuse to admit inspector.
law.text: No person shall refuse or attempt to prevent the admission of any inspector of the cabinet to any place which he or she is required by law to inspect, at any reasonable hour, or during the working hours of the persons employed there, or interfere with the performance of the official duties of any inspector.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1710, effective July 15, 2010. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 33a-8.
